name: Mikanko Fire Dance
text: Special Summon 1 "Mikanko" monster from your hand or GY, and if you do, equip it with this card, then you can Special Summon 1 monster from your opponent's GY to their field, but negate its effects. The equipped monster cannot be destroyed by card effects. You can only activate 1 "Mikanko Fire Dance" per turn.
